sentences.en: Among them, candles burned serenely like altar fires.
sentences.cn: 蜡烛在它们当中像圣餐台上的灯火般宁静地燃着.

sentences.en: Five cows graze serenely around a massive oak.
sentences.cn: 5头奶牛在一棵大橡树旁悠闲自在地啃着青草。

sentences.en: He seemed serenely unaware that anything had gone wrong.
sentences.cn: 他神色平静,似乎并不知道已出事了.

sentences.en: I also learned that people can act very serenely in a crisis.
sentences.cn: 我还领会到,即使在发生危机的时候,人们还是能够沉着冷静地处事的.

sentences.en: I had the feeling that he was waiting, too -- serenely patient.
sentences.cn: 我有种感觉,他也在 安静 耐心地等待着.

sentences.en: Mr. Quilp was serenely gazing at the stars, quite absorbed in celestial contemplation.
sentences.cn: 奎尔普先生正在从容地注视着繁星, 好象全神对着天空沉思似的.

sentences.en: She carried on serenely sipping her gin and tonic.
sentences.cn: 她继续安静地小口抿着加奎宁水的杜松子酒。

sentences.en: She sauntered onto the set, looking serenely confident.
sentences.cn: 她漫步到拍摄片场, 看起来沉着而自信.

sentences.en: Teacher sits serenely, in hand's teacup is braving the steam.
sentences.cn: 老师安详地坐着, 手中的茶杯冒着热气.

sentences.en: The boat sailed serenely on towards the horizon.
sentences.cn: 小船平稳地向着天水交接处驶去.

sentences.en: The early sun shone serenely on embrowned groves and still green fields.
sentences.cn: 朝阳宁静地照耀着已经发黄的树丛和还是一片绿色的田地.

sentences.en: The procession serenely, like a cortege entering the cemetery gates.
sentences.cn: 它们安详地滑过去, 像送葬队列走进公墓大门时那样.

sentences.en: We sailed serenely down the river.
When he was dying in the factory hospital among strange people, he smiled serenely.
sentences.cn: 当他在工厂医院里陌生的人们中间咽下最后一口气的时候, 他露出宁静的微笑.

sentences.en: Where thoughts serenely sweet express How pure, how dear their dwelling place.
sentences.cn: 这般祥和恬逸的思绪传达着如此纯净 、 教人爱怜的来处.
